name: Design Status Helpers
description:
These components will helps to you and your team to know in which status are the screens that are made. The statuses are customizable which your own colours or 'status labels'.


You can also link your links of JIRA, Confluence, Notion, or wherever you put your tasks.


Feedback is really appreciated.


You can reach me on twitter @julioservan


## [1.0] - 20-09-20
Release of 'Status Helpers'.

## [1.1] - 21-09-20
### Added 
- Light version for small teams or if you are the only one designer.
